short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically play all sounds on ChatGPT sequentially

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AutoSound for ChatGPT
Automatically play all sounds on ChatGPT sequentially with a single click. Just press "Listen" to start the audio experience and enjoy seamless playback of all sound elements within your ChatGPT sessions. Perfect for users who want to stay engaged with every auditory detail without manual control.
